name: Nightmare Killer (Rennan24)
description:
Story/Theme:

You play as this little boy who loves to sleep, because once he's asleep he gets to leap into his nightmares and fight back! But because he's inside a nightmare, he cannot go past the boundaries of his nightmare. How long will You be able to survive this nightmare world?

Controls: ActionKeyboard / Mouse
GamepadMovementWASD / Arrow Keys

AimMouseRight Stick
FireLeft Mouse Button
Right Trigger
Swap Weapon
Q and E
